ygData.subject: Re: List activity? Let get it going.
ygData.msgSnippet: I read this list and have a quest question? :) I am working on the lost book quest -- this one is going ok right now but the quest that I am having a hard time
ygData.messageBody:
I read this list and have a quest question? :)

I am working on the lost book quest -- this one is going ok right now

but the quest that I am having a hard time with is the peacekeeper staff
quest
the question I have is can a Magi use the Peacekeeper Staff?
if this staff is not usable by the Magi Classes then I will abandon the
quest due to the fact that I have not found one of the items needed to
complete the quest.

Mushin wrote:

> Would everyone who is in this mail list please post a message to let
> me know if this list is active. So far I have not heard much from
> people and I am not the list moderator but I will be trying to promote
> this list and make it interesting for everyone.
